dsOverview.title: University of Wisconsin Antarctic Surface Observations

summary.p: This dataset contains daily surface observations from polar automatic weather stations on Antarctica from January 1980. Observations are available every 3 hours and include surface pressure, air temperature, humidity and wind speed and direction.
